title: 3v3 Time frame increase
body: Hey guys, any chance of adding 1 extra day to the 3v3 time frame to see how well it goes? We've had 3 days for a while now, and whilst it's been good, the queue times don't seem to be that big at all? Implying a lot of people are playing? I find it odd that in from what I read, the main reason 3v3 isn't being extended is due to queue times, but whenever I try and do a Team Builder match, which is up more permanently than 3s, the queue time is ridiculously longer than any queue time I've had to wait for a 3v3 match? What's the go?

replies.body:
I agree. they have said they are removing teambuilder, hopefully this means they might replace it with 3v3

please riot!
